commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing show
commands.summary: Get the listing of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing show --offer-id
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing show --offer-id MyOfferId

commands.name: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing update
commands.summary: Update the listing of a marketplace offer.
commands.syntax:
az partnercenter marketplace offer listing update --offer-id
                                                  [--add]
                                                  [--description]
                                                  [--force-string]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--short-description]
                                                  [--summary]
examples: az partnercenter marketplace offer listing update --offer-id MyOfferId --summary "My offer summary"
